name: io.github.delorenj/mcp-server-trello
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides tools for interacting with Trello boards. This server enables seamless integration with Trello's API while handling rate limiting, type safety, and error handling automatically.

environment_variables.name: TRELLO_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: The API key for authenticating with Trello

environment_variables.name: TRELLO_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: The token for authenticating with Trello

environment_variables.name: TRELLO_BOARD_ID
environment_variables.description: The ID of the default Trello board to interact with
